caption:
“Creation is God’s silent symphony.”

Reflection:
Every breeze, every dawn, every heartbeat is a note in the divine song. The world hums with hidden harmony.

Commentary:
This reflection reveals nature as worship — a continuous offering of praise. Listening deeply, we hear God’s melody in all things.
